oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion and performances - Southern Blood: Celebrating Gregg Allman - 2017-09-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Discussion and performances honoring the legacy of Gregg Allman from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 15, 2017. Participants include Michael Lehman, Luther Dickinson, Cody Dickinson, Joan Osborne, Rodney Hall and Scott Billington. Moderated by Scott Goldman. Include audio from video and selected recorded audio excerpts. In partnership with the Americana Music Association.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Scott Goldman; Michael Lehman; Luther Dickinson; Cody Dickinson; Joan Osborne; Rodney Hall; Scott Billington; Aaron Lee Tasjan;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (00:32) Announcement by Abi Tapia / (00:52) Walk-in music continues / (02:52) Opening comments by Michael Gray and introduction of Garth Fundis / (04:42) Comments from Garth Fundis / (05:58) Comments and introduction of Scott Goldman by Michael Gray / (06:54) Opening comments by Scott Goldman / (07:18) Historical background on Gregg Allman / (08:35) Plays video / (12:01) Allman solo career background / (12:47) Plays video of the song My Only True Friend / (19:10) Scott introduces the guest panelists / (21:29) Joan Osborne talks about her first time hearing the Allman Brothers Band / (22:28) Cody Dickinson talks about his first time hearing the Allman Brothers Band / (32:10) Scott asks Luther Dickinson about the similarities between the Allman Brothers band and the North Mississippi Allstars / (23:36) Luther talks about his father working with the brothers and Tom Dowd / (25:15) Luther talks about opening a show for Gregg /

(23:36) Luther talks about his father working with the brothers and Tom Dowd / (25:15) Luther talks about opening a show for Gregg / (25:52) Joan talks about Gregg as a vocalist / (27:25) Michael Lehman talks about the recording of the song My Only True Friend / (28:32) Michael talks about producer Don Was and Gregg's thoughts on the sessions / (31:58) Michael asks about the environment at FAME studios in Muscle Shoals and comments are made about studios where recordings have been made and how their geography effects the songs / (32:11) Comments are made about Gregg's songs and chord changes / (33:21) Joan talks about appearing with the Allman Brothers at the Beacon Theater / (35:20) Michael asks Luther and Cody to perform a song / (36:07) Performs unidentified instrumental (Luther and Cody Dickinson) / (39:32) Michael thanks the Dickinson Brothers for the performance and they leave the discussion / (40:06) Michael introduces new panelists Rodney Hall and Scott Billington /
